long_description: Lightweight and easy to carry, this LED lantern gives you bright, white light both indoors and out. 2 light settings allow you to control the brightness and set the mood. Built-in hanger lets you hang the lantern from a branch or inside your tent. Built-in compass gives you your bearings. Requires 4 C batteries, sold separately.
short_description: Lightweight and easy to carry, this LED lantern gives you bright, white light both indoors and out.
